name: A Very Paco Halloween
description:
paco.

You are going to your friend's house for the annual Halloween party. The catch? Everyone's cosplaying as your other friend Paco! You must decide who is worthy of the title of Best Paco Cosplay Of The Year.

A short little visual novel made for the 2022 Spooktober Visual Novel Jam.

  • 6000~ words, 7 endings + lots of CGs, roughly 20-25 minutes of content total.
  • Nothing really scary here! Just some lighthearted, friendly antics at the costume party.
  • Playable in-browser and downloadable!

Art and writing all produced by me, ZenithZyie: My Twitter here.

Music attributions: Spook and Spook4 - PeriTune, links provided in About page in game.
